verses.verse: Righteous <S%H6662><s%> art thou <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, when I contend <S%H7378><s%> with thee <S%H1696><s%>; yet would I reason the cause <S%H4941><s%> with thee <S%H1870><s%>: wherefore doth the way of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> prosper <S%H6743><s%>? wherefore are all they at ease <S%H7951><s%> that deal very <S%H899><s%> treacherously <S%H898><s%>?

Thou hast planted <S%H5193><s%> them <S%H8327><s%>, yea, they have taken root; they grow <S%H3212><s%>, yea <S%H6213><s%>, they bring forth fruit <S%H6529><s%>: thou art near <S%H7138><s%> in their mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and far from <S%H7350><s%> their heart <S%H3629><s%>.

But thou <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, knowest <S%H3045><s%> me <S%H7200><s%>; thou seest me <S%H974><s%>, and triest my heart <S%H3820><s%> toward thee <S%H5423><s%>: pull them out like sheep <S%H6629><s%> for the slaughter <S%H2878><s%>, and prepare <S%H6942><s%> them for the day <S%H3117><s%> of slaughter <S%H2028><s%>.

How long shall the land <S%H776><s%> mourn <S%H56><s%>, and the herbs <S%H6212><s%> of the whole country <S%H7704><s%> wither <S%H3001><s%>? for the wickedness <S%H7451><s%> of them that dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein <S%H929><s%>, the beasts are consumed <S%H5595><s%>, and the birds <S%H5775><s%>; because they said <S%H559><s%>, He shall not see <S%H7200><s%> our latter end <S%H319><s%>.

If thou hast run <S%H7323><s%> with the footmen <S%H7273><s%>, and they have wearied <S%H3811><s%> thee <S%H8474><s%>, then how canst thou contend with horses <S%H5483><s%>? and though in a land <S%H776><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> thou art secure <S%H982><s%>, yet how wilt thou do <S%H6213><s%> in the pride of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>?

For even thy brethren <S%H251><s%>, and the house <S%H1004><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%>, even they have dealt treacherously <S%H898><s%> with thee <S%H7121><s%>; even they have cried aloud <S%H4392><s%> after <S%H310><s%> thee <S%H539><s%>: believe them not <S%H1696><s%>, though they speak fair words unto thee <S%H2896><s%>.

I have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> my house <S%H1004><s%>, I have cast <S%H5203><s%> off my heritage <S%H5159><s%>; I have given <S%H5414><s%> the dearly beloved <S%H3033><s%> of my soul <S%H5315><s%> into the hand <S%H3709><s%> of her enemies <S%H341><s%>.
My heritage <S%H5159><s%> is become unto me as a lion <S%H738><s%> in the forest <S%H3293><s%>: she hath uttered <S%H5414><s%> her voice against me <S%H8130><s%>; therefore I have hated her.

Is my heritage <S%H5159><s%> unto me as a speckled <S%H6641><s%> bird <S%H5861><s%> of prey <S%H5861><s%>? are the birds of prey against her round about <S%H5439><s%>? go <S%H3212><s%> ye <S%H622><s%>, assemble all the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, bring <S%H857><s%> them to devour <S%H402><s%>.

Many <S%H7227><s%> shepherds <S%H7462><s%> have destroyed <S%H7843><s%> my vineyard <S%H3754><s%>, they have trodden <S%H947><s%> my portion <S%H2513><s%> under foot <S%H947><s%>, they have made <S%H5414><s%> my pleasant <S%H2532><s%> portion <S%H2513><s%> a desolate <S%H8077><s%> wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

They have made <S%H7760><s%> it a desolation <S%H8076><s%>; it mourneth <S%H56><s%> unto me <S%H8077><s%>, being desolate; the whole land <S%H776><s%> is made desolate <S%H8074><s%>, because no man <S%H376><s%> layeth <S%H7760><s%> it to heart <S%H3820><s%>.

Destroyers <S%H7703><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> upon all the bare heights <S%H8205><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>; for the sword <S%H2719><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> devoureth <S%H398><s%> from the one end <S%H7097><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> even to the other end <S%H7097><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>: no flesh <S%H1320><s%> hath peace <S%H7965><s%>.

They have sown <S%H2232><s%> wheat <S%H2406><s%>, and have reaped <S%H7114><s%> thorns <S%H6975><s%>; they have put themselves to pain <S%H2470><s%>, and profit <S%H3276><s%> nothing <S%H954><s%>: and ye shall be ashamed of your fruits <S%H8393><s%>, because of the fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> against all mine evil <S%H7451><s%> neighbors <S%H7934><s%>, that touch <S%H5060><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> which I have caused my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> to inherit <S%H5157><s%>: behold <S%H5428><s%>, I will pluck them up from off their land <S%H127><s%>, and will pluck up <S%H5428><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> from among them <S%H8432><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H310><s%>, after that I have plucked them up <S%H5428><s%>, I will return <S%H7725><s%> and have compassion <S%H7355><s%> on them <S%H7725><s%>; and I will bring them again, every man <S%H376><s%> to his heritage <S%H5159><s%>, and every man <S%H376><s%> to his land <S%H776><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H3925><s%>, if they will diligently learn <S%H3925><s%> the ways <S%H1870><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>, to swear <S%H7650><s%> by my name <S%H8034><s%>, As Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>; even as they taught <S%H3925><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> to swear <S%H7650><s%> by Baal <S%H1168><s%>; then shall they be built <S%H1129><s%> up in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>.

But if they will not hear <S%H8085><s%>, then will I pluck <S%H5428><s%> up <S%H5428><s%> that nation <S%H1471><s%>, plucking up <S%H5428><s%> and destroying it <S%H5002><s%>, saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
